quiz.question: ____ mournfully
quiz.explanation: 悲伤地,悲伤地哭泣。The widow would weep mournfully at her husband's funeral.寡妇会在丈夫的葬礼上悲伤地哭泣。

quiz.question: ____ blissfully
quiz.explanation: 幸福地,幸福地生活。The newlyweds would live blissfully in their countryside cottage.新婚夫妇会在乡村小屋中幸福地生活。

quiz.question: _____ fitfully
quiz.explanation: 断断续续地,断断续续地睡觉。The worried mother would sleep fitfully checking on her sick child.担心的母亲会断断续续地睡觉,不断查看生病的孩子。

quiz.question: ____ artfully
quiz.explanation: 巧妙地,巧妙地计划。The strategist would plan artfully to outmaneuver the competition.战略家会巧妙地计划以智胜竞争对手。

quiz.question: ____ wistfully
quiz.explanation: 怀念地,怀念地叹气。She would sigh wistfully while looking at old photographs.她看着旧照片时会怀念地叹气。

quiz.question: ____ playfully
quiz.explanation: 嬉戏地,嬉戏地玩耍。The puppies would play playfully together in the garden.小狗们会在花园里嬉戏地一起玩耍。

quiz.question: ____ gully
quiz.explanation: 沟壑,深沟壑。The hikers had to cross a deep gully to reach the summit.徒步旅行者必须穿过深沟壑才能到达山顶。

quiz.question: ___ foully
quiz.explanation: 卑鄙地,卑鄙地行动。The villain would act foully to achieve his evil goals.恶棍会卑鄙地行动以实现他的邪恶目标。

quiz.question: ___ dimly
quiz.explanation: 昏暗地,昏暗地看见。Through the fog, they could only see dimly the path ahead.透过雾,他们只能昏暗地看见前方的道路。

quiz.question: ___ grimly
quiz.explanation: 严峻地,严峻地说。The doctor would say grimly that the prognosis was poor.医生会严峻地说预后很差。

quiz.question: ___ primly
quiz.explanation: 拘谨地,拘谨地坐。The proper lady would sit primly with her hands folded.端庄的女士会拘谨地坐着,双手交叉。

quiz.question: ___ glumly
quiz.explanation: 忧郁地,忧郁地说。After losing the game, he would say glumly that they tried their best.输掉比赛后,他会忧郁地说他们尽力了。

quiz.question: ____ cleanly
quiz.explanation: 干净地,干净地洗。The surgeon would wash cleanly before every operation.外科医生会在每次手术前干净地洗手。

quiz.question: _______ keenly
quiz.explanation: 激烈地,激烈地竞争。The rivals would compete keenly for the championship title.对手们会为冠军头衔激烈地竞争。

quiz.question: _____ benignly
quiz.explanation: 和蔼地,和蔼地微笑。The kind grandfather would smile benignly at his grandchildren.和蔼的祖父会对他的孙子们和蔼地微笑。

quiz.question: ____ ungainly
quiz.explanation: 笨拙地,笨拙地移动。The tall teenager would move ungainly as if unsure of his limbs.高个子的青少年会笨拙地移动,好像不确定自己的四肢。

quiz.question: ___ vainly
quiz.explanation: 徒劳地,徒劳地尝试。He would try vainly to fix the broken machine without proper tools.他会徒劳地试图在没有合适工具的情况下修理坏机器。

quiz.question: _____ solemnly
quiz.explanation: 庄严地,庄严地说话。The priest would speak solemnly during the wedding ceremony.牧师会在婚礼仪式上庄严地说话。

quiz.question: ____ sternly
quiz.explanation: 严厉地,严厉地警告。The parent would warn sternly against dangerous behavior.家长会严厉地警告危险行为。

quiz.question: ____ limply
quiz.explanation: 无力地,无力地走。After the injury, he would walk limply with a noticeable limp.受伤后,他会无力地走,明显跛行。

quiz.question: ______ pimply
quiz.explanation: 有粉刺的,有粉刺的皮肤。The teenager was self-conscious about his pimply skin.青少年对自己有粉刺的皮肤感到不自在。

quiz.question: ______ crisply
quiz.explanation: 干脆地,干脆地回答。The military officer would answer crisply with brief responses.军官会用简短的回答干脆地回答。

quiz.question: ______ pearly
quiz.explanation: 珍珠般的,珍珠般的白牙。The model showed off her pearly whites in every photograph.模特在每张照片中都展示她珍珠般的白牙。

quiz.question: ____ singularly
quiz.explanation: 非凡地,非凡地唱歌。The opera star would sing singularly with unmatched vocal range.歌剧明星会以无与伦比的音域非凡地唱歌。

quiz.question: _____ soberly
quiz.explanation: 朴素地,朴素地打扮。For the funeral, everyone would dress soberly in dark colors.葬礼上,每个人都会穿深色衣服朴素地打扮。

quiz.question: ____ gingerly
quiz.explanation: 小心翼翼地,小心翼翼地踏步。She would step gingerly across the icy sidewalk.她会小心翼翼地踏过结冰的人行道。

quiz.question: ___ improperly
quiz.explanation: 不当地,不当地行动。The employee was fired for continuing to act improperly at work.员工因在工作中继续不当地行动而被解雇。

quiz.question: ___ bitterly
quiz.explanation: 痛苦地,痛苦地哭泣。The betrayed friend would cry bitterly over the broken trust.被背叛的朋友会为破碎的信任痛苦地哭泣。

quiz.question: _____ burly
quiz.explanation: 魁梧的,魁梧的保安。The burly guard stood at the entrance checking identification.魁梧的保安站在入口处检查身份证件。

quiz.question: _____ surly
quiz.explanation: 粗暴的,粗暴的态度。The waiter's surly attitude ruined the dining experience.服务员粗暴的态度破坏了用餐体验。

quiz.question: ___ sly
quiz.explanation: 狡猾地,狡猾地行动。The fox would act sly to trick the other animals.狐狸会狡猾地行动来欺骗其他动物。

quiz.question: ______ grisly
quiz.explanation: 可怕的,可怕的谋杀。The detective investigated the grisly murder scene.侦探调查了可怕的谋杀现场。

quiz.question: _____ tonelessly
quiz.explanation: 单调地,单调地说话。The depressed patient would speak tonelessly without inflection.沮丧的病人会单调地说话,没有语调变化。

quiz.question: _____ pointlessly
quiz.explanation: 毫无意义地,毫无意义地争论。They would argue pointlessly about trivial matters for hours.他们会为琐碎的事情毫无意义地争论几个小时。

quiz.question: ___ listlessly
quiz.explanation: 无精打采地,无精打采地坐。The bored teenager would sit listlessly staring at nothing.无聊的青少年会无精打采地坐着,盯着虚空。

quiz.question: ______ crossly
quiz.explanation: 生气地,生气地回答。The irritated parent would answer crossly when interrupted.被打扰的家长会生气地回答。

quiz.question: _____ raucously
quiz.explanation: 刺耳地,刺耳地大笑。The drunk men would laugh raucously in the bar.醉酒的男人会在酒吧里刺耳地大笑。

quiz.question: tremendously __________
quiz.explanation: 极其,极其成功。The new product launch was tremendously successful beyond expectations.新产品发布极其成功,超出预期。

quiz.question: ______ viciously
quiz.explanation: 凶狠地,凶狠地攻击。The guard dog would attack viciously anyone who entered illegally.警犬会凶狠地攻击任何非法进入的人。

quiz.question: _____ ferociously
quiz.explanation: 凶猛地,凶猛地咆哮。The bear would growl ferociously when protecting its cubs.熊在保护幼崽时会凶猛地咆哮。

quiz.question: ___ unceremoniously
quiz.explanation: 随便地,随便地行动。The rude guest would act unceremoniously without proper manners.粗鲁的客人会随便地行动,没有适当的礼貌。

quiz.question: _____ sanctimoniously
quiz.explanation: 假装虔诚地,假装虔诚地说话。The hypocrite would speak sanctimoniously about morality while acting immorally.伪君子会假装虔诚地谈论道德,同时行为不道德。

quiz.question: _______ precariously
quiz.explanation: 不稳定地,不稳定地平衡。The vase would balance precariously on the edge of the table.花瓶会不稳定地平衡在桌子边缘。

quiz.question: _____ uproariously
quiz.explanation: 喧闹地,喧闹地大笑。The audience would laugh uproariously at the comedian's jokes.观众会对喜剧演员的笑话喧闹地大笑。

quiz.question: variously _________
quiz.explanation: 不同地,不同地描述。The mysterious figure was variously described by witnesses.神秘人物被目击者不同地描述。

quiz.question: _______ imperiously
quiz.explanation: 专横地,专横地命令。The tyrant would command imperiously expecting instant obedience.暴君会专横地命令,期待立即服从。

quiz.question: ____ laboriously
quiz.explanation: 费力地,费力地工作。The old man would work laboriously at tasks that once seemed easy.老人会费力地工作完成曾经看似简单的任务。

quiz.question: ___ curiously
quiz.explanation: 好奇地,好奇地问。The child would ask curiously about everything in the museum.孩子会好奇地询问博物馆里的一切。

quiz.question: _____ ostentatiously
quiz.explanation: 炫耀地,炫耀地打扮。The wealthy woman would dress ostentatiously in designer clothing.富有的女人会穿着名牌服装炫耀地打扮。

quiz.question: ___ surreptitiously
quiz.explanation: 偷偷地,偷偷地行动。The spy would act surreptitiously to avoid detection.间谍会偷偷地行动以避免被发现。

quiz.question: _______ cautiously
quiz.explanation: 谨慎地,谨慎地进行。The soldiers would proceed cautiously through enemy territory.士兵们会谨慎地穿过敌方领土。

quiz.question: ___ callously
quiz.explanation: 冷酷地,冷酷地行动。The cruel person would act callously ignoring others' suffering.残忍的人会冷酷地行动,无视他人的痛苦。

quiz.question: ___ incredulously
quiz.explanation: 怀疑地,怀疑地问。He would ask incredulously if the unbelievable story was true.他会怀疑地问难以置信的故事是否真实。

quiz.question: _____ tremulously
quiz.explanation: 颤抖地,颤抖地说话。The nervous witness would speak tremulously during testimony.紧张的证人会在作证时颤抖地说话。

quiz.question: ____ venomously
quiz.explanation: 恶毒地,恶毒地嘶嘶声。The angry snake would hiss venomously when threatened.愤怒的蛇在受到威胁时会恶毒地发出嘶嘶声。

quiz.question: _____ pompously
quiz.explanation: 自大地,自大地说话。The arrogant professor would speak pompously about his achievements.傲慢的教授会自大地谈论他的成就。

quiz.question: _______ rapturously
quiz.explanation: 狂喜地,狂喜地鼓掌。The fans would applaud rapturously after the stunning performance.在惊人的表演后,粉丝们会狂喜地鼓掌。

quiz.question: _____ riotously
quiz.explanation: 喧闹地,喧闹地聚会。The college students would party riotously until dawn.大学生们会喧闹地聚会直到黎明。

quiz.question: ____ assiduously
quiz.explanation: 勤勉地,勤勉地工作。The dedicated student would work assiduously on every assignment.专注的学生会勤勉地完成每项作业。

quiz.question: ____ sinuously
quiz.explanation: 蜿蜒地,蜿蜒地移动。The snake would move sinuously through the tall grass.蛇会蜿蜒地穿过高草丛。

quiz.question: _____ contemptuously
quiz.explanation: 轻蔑地,轻蔑地冷笑。The bully would sneer contemptuously at weaker students.恶霸会轻蔑地冷笑较弱的学生。

quiz.question: ____ tortuously
quiz.explanation: 曲折地,曲折地蜿蜒。The mountain road would wind tortuously up the steep slope.山路会曲折地蜿蜒向上陡坡。

quiz.question: _____ mischievously
quiz.explanation: 淘气地,淘气地微笑。The child would smile mischievously after hiding the cookies.孩子藏起饼干后会淘气地微笑。

quiz.question: _______ grievously
quiz.explanation: 严重地,严重地受伤。The soldier was grievously injured in the explosion.士兵在爆炸中严重地受伤。

quiz.question: ___ indistinctly
quiz.explanation: 模糊地,模糊地说。The mumbling person would say indistinctly making it hard to understand.喃喃自语的人会模糊地说话,让人难以理解。

quiz.question: ____ unsightly
quiz.explanation: 难看的,看起来难看。The abandoned building began to look unsightly with peeling paint.废弃的建筑物因油漆剥落而开始看起来难看。

quiz.question: _____ extravagantly
quiz.explanation: 奢侈地,奢侈地花费。The lottery winner would spend extravagantly on luxury items.彩票中奖者会奢侈地花费购买奢侈品。

quiz.question: ______ defiantly
quiz.explanation: 挑衅地,挑衅地拒绝。The rebel would refuse defiantly to follow unjust orders.叛逆者会挑衅地拒绝遵守不公正的命令。

quiz.question: _____ jubilantly
quiz.explanation: 欢欣鼓舞地,欢欣鼓舞地欢呼。The team would cheer jubilantly after winning the championship.球队在赢得冠军后会欢欣鼓舞地欢呼。

quiz.question: ______ petulantly
quiz.explanation: 任性地,任性地回答。The spoiled child would answer petulantly when denied candy.被宠坏的孩子被拒绝糖果时会任性地回答。

quiz.question: _______ indignantly
quiz.explanation: 愤怒地,愤怒地抗议。The wrongly accused would protest indignantly against the false charges.被错误指控的人会愤怒地抗议虚假指控。

quiz.question: ____ exuberantly
quiz.explanation: 茂盛地,茂盛地生长。The jungle plants would grow exuberantly in the humid climate.丛林植物会在潮湿的气候中茂盛地生长。

quiz.question: ____ expectantly
quiz.explanation: 期待地,期待地等待。The children would wait expectantly for Santa Claus on Christmas Eve.孩子们会在圣诞夜期待地等待圣诞老人。

quiz.question: _____ complacently
quiz.explanation: 自满地,自满地微笑。The overconfident player would smile complacently before losing.过度自信的球员会在输球前自满地微笑。

quiz.question: _______ magnificently
quiz.explanation: 出色地,出色地表演。The orchestra would perform magnificently at the concert hall.管弦乐队会在音乐厅出色地表演。

quiz.question: ___ innocently
quiz.explanation: 天真地,天真地行动。The child would act innocently unaware of the trouble caused.孩子会天真地行动,不知道造成的麻烦。

quiz.question: ______ reminiscently
quiz.explanation: 怀旧地,怀旧地回忆。The elderly man would recall reminiscently his youth and adventures.老人会怀旧地回忆他的青春和冒险。

quiz.question: ____ ardently
quiz.explanation: 热烈地,热烈地爱。The devoted couple would love ardently throughout their lives.忠诚的夫妇会一生热烈地相爱。

quiz.question: ____ obediently
quiz.explanation: 顺从地,顺从地服从。The trained dog would obey obediently every command given.训练有素的狗会顺从地服从每一个命令。

quiz.question: _____ insolently
quiz.explanation: 无礼地,无礼地说话。The rude teenager would speak insolently to authority figures.粗鲁的青少年会对权威人物无礼地说话。

quiz.question: ___ reverently
quiz.explanation: 恭敬地,恭敬地鞠躬。The worshippers would bow reverently before the altar.礼拜者会在祭坛前恭敬地鞠躬。

quiz.question: _____ absently
quiz.explanation: 心不在焉地,心不在焉地凝视。The distracted student would stare absently out the window.心不在焉的学生会心不在焉地凝视窗外。

quiz.question: ______ intently
quiz.explanation: 专心地,专心地倾听。The detective would listen intently to every word of testimony.侦探会专心地倾听每一句证词。

quiz.question: __ inadvertently
quiz.explanation: 无意中,无意中做。He would inadvertently offend people with thoughtless comments.他会用不经思考的评论无意中冒犯别人。

quiz.question: ____ fervently
quiz.explanation: 热切地,热切地祈祷。The desperate mother would pray fervently for her child's recovery.绝望的母亲会为孩子的康复热切地祈祷。

quiz.question: _______ faintly
quiz.explanation: 微弱地,微弱地呼吸。The dying man could only breathe faintly in his final moments.垂死的男人在最后时刻只能微弱地呼吸。

quiz.question: _______ saintly
quiz.explanation: 圣人般的,圣人般的耐心。The caregiver showed saintly patience with difficult patients.护理人员对困难的病人表现出圣人般的耐心。

quiz.question: _____ hotly
quiz.explanation: 激烈地,激烈地争论。The opponents would argue hotly over the controversial issue.对手们会就有争议的问题激烈地争论。

quiz.question: ______ tartly
quiz.explanation: 尖酸地,尖酸地回答。She would answer tartly when annoyed by foolish questions.当被愚蠢的问题惹恼时,她会尖酸地回答。

quiz.question: ___ covertly
quiz.explanation: 秘密地,秘密地行动。The undercover agent would act covertly to gather intelligence.卧底特工会秘密地行动收集情报。

quiz.question: ______ portly
quiz.explanation: 肥胖的,肥胖的绅士。The portly gentleman struggled to fit into the narrow theater seat.肥胖的绅士很难坐进狭窄的剧院座位。

quiz.question: _____ curtly
quiz.explanation: 简短无礼地,简短无礼地回答。The busy executive would reply curtly to unwanted interruptions.忙碌的高管会对不受欢迎的打扰简短无礼地回答。

quiz.question: _______ ghastly
quiz.explanation: 可怕的,可怕的场景。The accident left a ghastly scene that traumatized witnesses.事故留下了可怕的场景,使目击者受到创伤。

quiz.question: _______ bristly
quiz.explanation: 刺人的,刺人的胡须。His bristly beard scratched her face when they kissed.他刺人的胡须在他们接吻时划伤了她的脸。

quiz.question: _______ ghostly
quiz.explanation: 幽灵般的,幽灵般的身影。A ghostly figure appeared in the fog on the moor.一个幽灵般的身影出现在荒原的雾中。

quiz.question: ______ stoutly
quiz.explanation: 顽强地,顽强地抵抗。The defenders would resist stoutly against overwhelming odds.守卫者会在压倒性的劣势中顽强地抵抗。

quiz.question: ____ lowly
quiz.explanation: 卑微地,卑微地出生。Despite being born lowly, he rose to greatness through hard work.尽管卑微地出生,他通过努力工作取得了伟大成就。

quiz.question: _____ slyly
quiz.explanation: 狡猾地,狡猾地微笑。The trickster would smile slyly before revealing the prank.骗子在揭示恶作剧前会狡猾地微笑。

quiz.question: _____ wryly
quiz.explanation: 苦笑地,苦笑地微笑。He would smile wryly at life's ironies and disappointments.他会对生活的讽刺和失望苦笑地微笑。

quiz.question: ______ steamy
quiz.explanation: 充满蒸汽的,充满蒸汽的浴室。The steamy bathroom mirrors fogged up after the hot shower.热水澡后,充满蒸汽的浴室镜子起雾了。
